column5: After nursing myself back to health from a self inflicted hangover from last nights hooliganism I decided to head out and look for some pike at my local spot.  My father and I will be fishing there early tomorrow and I wanted to confirm they were in the locations we were planning on targeting.  Took several casts with the usual suspects...mepps spinners, xraps, etc.  After washing a few of those I swithced up to a fire tiger lil cleo and hooked the one and only fish of the evening.    Nice night out and I'm feeling much better now.  Corn Nug
